name: bear-watch
author: Philippe Ozil
description: Demonstration application for the 'Build an Instant Notification App' Trailhead project (an introduction to platform event).

scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:scripts
scripts.build:assets: npm install && cp -r node_modules/@salesforce-ux/design-system/assets public && cp -r client-src/assets public
scripts.build:scripts: mkdir -p public/scripts && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] client-src/scripts/*.js | uglifyjs > public/scripts/bundle.min.js
scripts.build-n-start: npm run build && npm run start
